text: Richard Corben (October 1, 1940 – December 2, 2020) was an American illustrator and comic book artist. He was best known for his comics seen in Heavy Metal magazine. He was the winner of the 2009 Spectrum Grand Master Award2009 Spectrum Grand Master Announced from Locus Online and the 2018 Grand Prix at Angoulême. In 2012 he was elected to the Will Eisner Award Hall of Fame. Corben died of heart surgery-related problems on December 2, 2020 at the age of 80.Richard Corben Has Died, Aged 80.
